openai.description: Primary model for comprehensive analysis and strategic insights

anthropic.description: Alternative model for detailed professional guidance analysis

google.description: Supplementary model for zone concept framework analysis

analysis_prompts.zone_concept: Analyze the Zone Concept framework data and provide strategic recommendations for advancement. Focus on the three core elements: anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidant, and rejuvenation protocols. Consider relevance scores, current technologies, and future development opportunities.
analysis_prompts.consciousness: Examine the organizational consciousness evolution data and provide insights on development trajectory. Analyze current state, evolution level, and growth indicators to recommend next steps for consciousness advancement.
analysis_prompts.guidance: Review the professional guidance framework and provide actionable enhancement recommendations. Focus on focus areas, current insights, and implementation strategies for improving client outcomes and organizational wisdom.
analysis_prompts.comprehensive: Conduct a holistic analysis of the RegimA organizational learning cycle, integrating all aspects: Zone Concept framework, consciousness evolution, and professional guidance. Provide strategic recommendations for the complete organizational development cycle.
